about_the_game:
Meteor Volleyball! is a simple, fun, comic-like volleyball game that simulates your life if there were a meteor heading towards Earth and you have to survive by piloting a volleyball robot.



  • Comic-like cut scene and fun dialogue.
  • 2D platform volleyball game.
  • Very simple control.
  • Various Special Skills.

Story
The earth is in danger of being destroyed by a huge meteorite!

Thanks to a genius Doctor, we can deflect meteorites!

But then...

Oh my gosh! This time, countless meteorites are falling!

If a meteor lands, your house will be destroyed!

Pilot the robot to protect our house!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS X 10.15
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4.1 - ATI Radeon HD 5670, NVIDIA GeForce GT 640M, Intel HD Graphics 4000, or Iris Pro Graphics
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS X 10.15 or Newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 2.4 GHz+
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4.1 - ATI Radeon HD 5670, NVIDIA GeForce GT 640M, Intel HD Graphics 4000, or Iris Pro Graphics
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
